channel.title: Games on Kat Purpy's Public Localhost
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Kat Purpy's Public Localhost

item.title: Super Monkey Post Celebration Diet
item.description: Description 0H N0!!! MONKE GOT P H A T AFTER CHRISTMAS! HE WANTS TO GO TO THE M00N BUT TOO MANY CALORIES. Help Monke accomplish his goal by working out, jumping on platforms and avoiding hazards that this cruel life gifts to us. Features new character: Buff Rhino or just Rhino 2 nicely written cutscenes 6 songs made specifically to bleed your ears a plot twist in the end 2000s styled graphics specifically to burn out your eyes based on real life events!

item.title: Super Monkey Bathtub Racing
item.description: Welcome to the Super Monkey Bathtub Racing! It is a low budget racing game created for MonoGameJam3. The results can be seen by clicking on this link. Features 3 tracks 3 game modes S T O R Y ! accidentally good enemy AI early 2000s aesthetic! âœ¨ legally stolen soundtrack! Screenshots Gameplay video Footage from the jam host: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ggTfxHrL9Vg&t=12097s The game begins at 3:27:21 (Sorry for inconivinience but couldn’t embed it because YouTube was being funky with timecodes)

item.title: Cats Love Heat
item.description: Description You are a ginger cat. You are cold. Find your warm place in this hardcore catformer christmas game! Jump away your problems and most importantly… don’t touch water! Screenshots Buy this game on The game was made with an opensource fantasy console named TIC-80 (tic80.com)

item.title: Once upon a time when the Universe died
item.description: Description It is year 87069095065082069095068079079077069068 after the Universe’s death. The only things left is you and a hungry tribe of creatures that wish to consume you. Move things around and find the Universal peace so the Universe could be reborn once more. Features 30+ levels! (10 in the current demo) Challenging controls (you have to use only one mouse and and two mouse buttons) Good sound design!

item.title: Pyutas
item.description: Description PyuTas is a game about pew pew(lazers) and insane shootouts with lazers. You are the computer user who tries to clear his local network from the computer virus. Use your only weapon(lasers) to vaporize the infection. Good luck! Features 4 levels of difficulty from braindead to rip! 6 challenging levels! Responsible controls! Clear retro arcade styled graphics! Custom game engine based on MonoGame! Screenshots Play the game for free on
